    • handleLogin

      private void handleLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles login button press event and directs user to the correct view. Authenticates credentials and switches scene based on user role.
      Parameters:
      event - login button pressed

    • authenticate

      private MainController.Role authenticate(String u, String p)
      Authenticates user credentials and assigns role based on username and password.
      Parameters:
      u - username entered
      p - password entered
      Returns:
      Role corresponding to valid user credentials (CASHIER, MANAGER, or NONE)
